full_threads.body:
Hi Theo,

Sure, we have updated the template. We have included the product category "RTW Trousers". 
https://belance.com.au/product/sanders-trousers-rtw-sandstone/

That's great thanks Joel!

Also quick question, so we've published the new RTW Trousers.

I noticed that the section below is different to the other trousers.

The template for the MADE TO ORDER trousers have the sections "FAQ | CONTACT US US" whereas the RTW TROUSERS have FAQ | CUSTOMIZE IT | CONTACT US",

Example: https://belance.com.au/product/aare-charcoal-wool-trousers/



Example: https://belance.com.au/product/sanders-trousers-rtw-sandstone/



Where do I go to change that?

Hi Theo, 

Sure, we have remove the selected variation. Let me know if this works for you? 
https://belance.com.au/product/reo-tailored-linen-trousers/

Great thanks!

I noticed on the product pages when we select a size it shoes like this the size again just above it? See screenshot.

Is there a way to change that?

Thanks,

Theo

Hi Theo,

Sure, I have added a new item on the "Sizing Guide" called "rtw-trousers" and then renamed the id of the table to "sizing-rtw-trousers".

Hi Joel,

Would you mind letting me know what you did so it shows up there?

Thanks!

Theo

When I go to "Sizing Guide", which is where I believe we select the right sizing guide from the "Pop-Up Template: Sizing Guide" I would like to have the option to select the section "TROUSER SIZING" for these products (see screenshot). Hope that makes sense? Unless there's another way of doing it?

Thanks,

Theo
